shrimp.name: Rayinfo
shrimp.description: Provides information on the current ray
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Returns the data associated with the current ray, as long as the data is known to the renderer and of correct type, in which case result will contain the associated data content, and rayinfo() will exit with 1, otherwise rayinfo() will exit with 0. The data accessible by the rayinfo() varies with each renderer's implementation, please check your renderer's documentation for details. Usual information to query is: "speculardepth", "diffusedepth", "shadowdepth", "depth", "type", "label", "origin", "direction", "length".
